39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"Indeed a disbeliever's skin will be forty-two forearm lengths thick, his molar teeth will be like Uhud (mountain), and his sitting place in Hell will be like what is between Makkah and Al-Madinah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عِظَمِ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Size of the Inhabitants of the Fire
